author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-227.  Add support for backup namenodes, which periodically get snapshots of the namenode state.  Contributed by Dhruba.

author: hogstrom
msg: Updated Release notes to reflect the capabilities of the OpenEJB we're shipping with.  Notably that ejb-jar.xml is required and @Resource for datasources is not implemented.

author: agilliland
msg: roller_user_permissions table should have foreign key constraints against rolleruser(id) and website(id).

author: agilliland
msg: fix for removeWebsite() so that it properly removes entries on a weblog via calls to WeblogManager.removeWeblogEntry().
update to getWebsites() method so that endDate is not mandatory.
